Description: As a Warehouse Helper, you will play a vital role in ensuring the smooth operation of our warehouse facility. Your primary responsibilities will include assisting with receiving, storing, and distributing products, maintaining inventory accuracy, and contributing to a safe and organized work environment. This is an opportunity to become an essential part of a collaborative team dedicated to meeting our customers' needs efficiently.Responsibilities:·        Assist with unloading incoming shipments, inspecting for damages, and verifying accurate quantities.·        Properly label, categorize, and store products in designated warehouse locations.·        Prepare orders for shipment by carefully selecting and packing items, ensuring their integrity during transit.·        Conduct regular inventory checks to maintain accurate stock levels and assist with cycle counts.·        Keep the warehouse clean and organized, following safety protocols and guidelines at all times.Skills
Skills: ·        Basic understanding of inventory management principles.
·        Ability to lift heavy objects and perform physically demanding tasks.
·        Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
